name: Quantity Modifiers
pages: $(item)Quantity Modifiers$() can be inserted into $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_emitter)$(item)Sculk Emitters$(). They allows their block to pick up and store a greater quantity of items. With one of these modifiers, a $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_emitter)$(item)Sculk Emitter$() is able to pick up more items at once from the container below. $(p)There are $(thing)3 different Quantity Modifiers$() with an increasing level of item capacity bonus.

pages.text: The $(item)Quantity Modifier (Tier 1)$() is the most basic quantity modifier, and is able to increase the block's item capacity to $(thing)4 items$().
The $(item)Quantity Modifier (Tier 2)$() is able to increase the block's item capacity to $(thing)16 items$().
The $(item)Quantity Modifier (Tier 3)$(), being the most advanced quantity modifier, is capable of increasing the block's item capacity to $(thing)64 items$().
